Author: fishonthesun
Text: If you are going to Uni they likely have a campus doctor who you could see. It would probably be helpful to tell them of your experience. If they start to dismiss you, be firm! Your health is ultimately in your hands. Make it clear you either want treatment at uni if they have ED treatment (you need ED treatment specifically) or a referral to a specialist who has a sliding scale cost. (Idk if that is a thing in Canada)  Good luck with everything, I'm sorry it's been so rough so far
